headline.0: Congress Must Step in to Prevent Another Deadly Meningitis Outbreak
headline.1: Starbucks Workers Tips Suit Scores $14 Million Win Against Coffee Giant

short_description.0: Lawmakers will hold the first hearings this week to investigate the deadly outbreak of meningitis in the United States. Those hearings represent a step in the right direction, but Congress must follow up with legislative action -- or run the risk that this outbreak will be followed by others.
